C:\\Users\\SegundoDiaz-MS4M\\Documents\\.serviceRawFile:
service: lambda-orchestrator
frameworkVersion: '4'

plugins:
  - serverless-offline

provider:
  name: aws
  runtime: nodejs20.x
  stage: local
  environment:
    NODE_ENV: development
    PORT: ${env:PORT, '3003'}
    CUSTOMERS_BASE: ${env:CUSTOMERS_BASE, 'http://localhost:3001'}
    ORDERS_BASE: ${env:ORDERS_BASE, 'http://localhost:3002'}
    SERVICE_TOKEN: ${env:SERVICE_TOKEN, 'service-secret'}
    JWT_SECRET: ${env:JWT_SECRET, 'super_secret_for_jwt'}

functions:
  orchestrate:
    handler: src/handler.handler
    events:
      - httpApi:
          path: /orchestrator/create-and-confirm-order
          method: post


build:
  esbuild: true
  sourcemap: true
  minify: false
  #format: esm     
  format: cjs         
  target: node20
  exclude:
    - aws-sdk
  tsconfig: tsconfig.json

custom:
  serverless-offline:
    httpPort: 3003        
    lambdaPort: 3005      fuera del 3002
    websocketPort: 3004   
    host: 0.0.0.0         
    noPrependStageInUrl: true
